\documentclass[class=acmart, border=2pt]{standalone}
\usepackage{pgfplots}
\pgfplotsset{
	compat=newest,
	% Opacity 0.5 in the legend
	every axis legend/.append style={
		fill=white,
		fill opacity=0.5,
		text opacity=1,
		font = \scriptsize,
	},
	every axis plot/.append style={
		fill opacity=1.0,
	}
}

\begin{document}
\thispagestyle{empty}

% @DATA

\begin{tikzpicture}
	\begin{axis}[
			table/col sep=comma,
			% Dimensions of the plot
			width=0.45\textwidth,
			height=0.33\textwidth,
			% Axis labels
			xlabel={Problem size (\#elements)},
			ylabel={Time (ns)},
			% Logarithmic scale (base 10 for y axis)
			ymode=log,
			log basis y=10,
			% Logarithmic scale (base 2 for x axis)
			xmode=log,
			log basis x=2,
			% Other parameters
			legend pos=north west,
			grid=major,
			grid style=dotted,
		]

\addplot+ [color=black, mark options={fill=black!60!white}, solid] table[x=X, y=Y, y error=Yerror] {\GCCSEQ}; \addlegendentry{GCC-SEQ (\mbox{\emph{Mach A}})};
\addplot+ [color=green!60!black, mark options={fill=green!60!white}, solid] table[x=X, y=Y, y error=Yerror] {\NVCOMP}; \addlegendentry{NVC-OMP (\mbox{\emph{Mach A}})};
\addplot+ [color=red, mark options={fill=red!60!white}, mark=triangle*, solid] table[x=X, y=Y, y error=Yerror] {\NVCTESLA}; \addlegendentry{NVC-CUDA (\mbox{\emph{Mach D}})};
\addplot+ [color=blue, mark options={fill=blue!60!white}, mark=*, solid] table[x=X, y=Y, y error=Yerror] {\NVCAMPERE}; \addlegendentry{NVC-CUDA (\mbox{\emph{Mach E}})};
		% @ADDPLOT

	\end{axis}
\end{tikzpicture}
